title: Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Professor Yuzhe Tang Receives Grant to Protect Ethereum Security ... - Syracuse University News
summary: Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Professor Yuzhe Tang receives grant to protect Ethereum security. Tang and his team will design, develop, and evaluate security hardening code to protect Ethereum network stack. The grant will support research to advance Ethereum blockchain ecosystem and protect against cyberattacks. Tang believes the research could have a lasting impact on cybersecurity and blockchain platforms.

title: Bitcoin ETFs are all the rage — why not Ethereum? - Blockworks
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Bitcoin ETFs are gaining traction, with BlackRock's recent filing reviving a decade-long effort to launch a bitcoin ETF. Other firms have also filed for similar products. However, the fate of ether ETFs remains uncertain, with the SEC treating them differently than bitcoin ETFs. While some expect an ether ETF to be approved if a spot bitcoin ETF is approved, others believe it's premature and the SEC may prefer to evaluate ether futures ETFs first. The article concludes that the approval of a spot bitcoin ETF could pave the way for an ether ETF, but the SEC's reasoning and the market's characteristics will be crucial in determining the fate of such a product.

title: 'Ethereum for Business': A Guide to Doing Business on Blockchain - University of Arkansas Newswire
summary: Epic Books, an imprint of the University of Arkansas' Sam M. Walton College of Business, is publishing "Ethereum for Business," a guide to doing business on the world's largest public blockchain, written by leading blockchain expert Paul Brody. The book provides an overview of Ethereum and its business applications, as well as more advanced technical topics, and is scheduled for publication in summer 2023. Brody has served as the Global Blockchain Leader at Ernst & Young (EY) since 2015 and is a prominent advocate for public blockchains and privacy technology. The book is currently available for preorder at various retailers for $19.95.

title: Casa launches multisignature Ethereum self-custody vault - Cointelegraph
summary: Casa, a cryptocurrency self-custody platform, has launched support for Ethereum (ETH) storage, offering multisignature Bitcoin (BTC) and ETH self-storage. This is the first time an industry has supported both protocols on the same platform. Casa's service allows users to store ETH using up to five keys for more distributed security. The platform has added ETH vault support amid high-profile collapses of custodians and hacks in the Web3 space. Industry experts say it's difficult to estimate the amount of BTC held in self-custody wallets.

title: Ethereum Rainbow chart sets ETH price for Jan 1, 2024 - Finbold - Finance in Bold
summary: Ethereum's rainbow chart suggests that the cryptocurrency could move into the "Still cheap" price area by January 1, 2024, based on a historical pattern. The chart shows Ethereum in the "Fire Sale" area, with a potential move to the "Undervalued" zone by April 2024. Another chart tool estimates that Ethereum's price could hover around $778 in January 2024 if it remains in the "Undervalued" zone. However, the article notes that the movement of Ethereum will depend on developments in the Ethereum network and the overall crypto and macroeconomic landscape.

title: Ethereum Price Consolidates Below $1,920: What Could Trigger A Fresh Increase? - NewsBTC
summary: Ethereum price is consolidating below $1,920, with the potential for a fresh increase unless there is an extended decline. The price is currently trading above $1,850 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average, with immediate resistance at $1,900 and the next major resistance at $1,930. If the bulls manage to push the price above the recent high, it could reach $1,950, potentially surpassing $2,000 and $2,120 resistance levels. However, if the price fails to clear $1,930, it could continue to move down, with initial support at $1,865 and major support at $1,820. Technical indicators, such as MACD and RSI, are losing momentum in the bullish zone.

summary:

Additionally, Bluntz notes that Bitcoin (BTC) has erased its two-month-long move to the downside and is a reminder of why crypto is the best asset class to trade.

title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin holds $30,000; Ethereum slips below $1,900; BNB, Solana & XRP fall up to 5% - Business Today
summary: Bitcoin and other major cryptocurrencies experienced a sharp drop on Friday, with Bitcoin falling to around $30,000 and Ethereum dropping below $1,900. The sell-off was attributed to profit booking and concerns about US SEC lawsuits filed against exchange powerhouses Binance and Coinbase, despite spot Bitcoin ETF filings with the US market regulator by three financial giants. Other altcoins also saw significant losses, with BNB, Solana, and XRP falling up to 5%. The global cryptocurrency market cap and total trading volumes also declined. However, some analysts remain optimistic about the long-term outlook for the crypto market, citing the potential for spot bitcoin ETFs to stabilize the market and pave the way for further growth.

title: Gemini Launches Ethereum Staking Pro Service in the UK - Crypto Times
summary:
Sure! Here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Gemini, a cryptocurrency exchange, has expanded its Ethereum staking service, Gemini Staking Pro, to the UK. The service allows users to earn rewards by staking their Ethereum holdings. To participate, users must have at least 32 Ether, equivalent to $60,000 at current market prices. The service offers regular payouts and no lock-up periods, and is available to individuals and institutions in the UK and other supported countries. Gemini encourages users to start staking their Ethereum holdings through Gemini Staking Pro, providing a simple and secure way to earn rewards while contributing to the Ethereum ecosystem.

title: 3 Breakout Cryptos That Could 10x by 2025 - Yahoo Finance
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Three cryptocurrencies have the potential to 10x by 2025: Solana (SOL), Nervos Network (CKB), and Storj (STORJ). Solana is a competitor to Ethereum and has potential in the decentralized finance space, while Nervos Network has a halving event in November that could drive price gains. Storj offers long-term value through its tokenomics and is overshadowed by Filecoin but has better pricing and decentralized storage benefits. The author does not hold any positions in the mentioned securities.

title: Winklevoss twins' Gemini launches Ethereum staking in the UK - Cointelegraph
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Gemini, a cryptocurrency exchange founded by the Winklevoss twins, has expanded its staking services to the UK. The platform is now offering Ethereum staking for institutions and high-net-worth individuals, with a minimum requirement of 32 Ether. Gemini Staking Pro is the only staking product available in the UK, and the platform will reimburse stakers for certain penalties. The move comes as Ethereum core developers plan to increase the minimum amount of Ether required to become a validator. Gemini is also facing a lawsuit from the SEC over its lending platform, but is pushing ahead with expansion plans.

title: Otherdeed Expanded, Pixelady Maker, OCM Karma, KILLABEARS and more collections added to Kraken NFT - Kraken Blog
summary: Kraken NFT has added five new collections: Otherdeed Expanded, Pixelady Maker, OCM Karma, KILLABEARS, and more. title: Ethereum dapps settle on Solana with Neon EVM's closed beta - crypto.news
summary: Neon EVM, a low-friction solution, enables Ethereum dapps to settle transactions on Solana, eliminating the gap between the two leading blockchains. Neon EVM positions Ethereum developers to enjoy Solana's network benefits, including low fees, high transaction speeds, and parallel transaction execution capabilities. The closed beta version of Neon EVM, Neon EVMβ, is now available on Solana's Mainnet, allowing for the seamless integration of services before the official launch. Neon EVM ecosystem includes many players, and launching in closed beta allows for controlled testing and onboarding. The team aims to switch to normal operation mode once testing ends and NEON tokens are available on the market. To get involved, join the community on Twitter and Discord.

title: USDT freezes $4.1m in Ethereum addresses: Is decentralization the way forward over centralization? - CryptoDaily
summary: Tether, the issuer of the largest stablecoin USDT, froze an account with $4.1m without explanation. This raises questions about the role of centralization in the DeFi ecosystem, with some arguing that decentralized projects like Tradecurve are essential for survival. Tradecurve offers a decentralized hybrid exchange with anonymous trading and various advantages, including AI-driven algorithmic trading and 500:1 leverage. The TCRV token is currently priced at $0.018 in the 4th stage of its official presale, with analysts predicting a 100x return.

title: Who is the Founder of Ethereum? ETH Crypto - Coin Culture
summary: Vitalik Buterin is the founder of Ethereum, a Russian-Canadian programmer who conceived the idea of Ethereum in 2013. He was 19 years old at the time and was working on various Bitcoin projects. Buterin created Ethereum to expand the reach of blockchain technology and develop a platform for decentralized applications (DApps). He released the Ethereum whitepaper in November 2013 and launched the platform in 2014 with a successful crowd sale. Ethereum has since become an integral part of the crypto market and Buterin's net worth is over $1 billion, according to Celebrity Net Worth.
